answers.answer: I was told by my OB that babies gain the most weight during the last ten weeks of pregnancy, they can double in weight. Have you asked to get another ultrasound done?

I have to get nst done 2x a week. This is due to me having mild preeclampsia. They also told me my baby girl would stop growing early when I was 17 w. Then at my 26w u/s she weighed 2lbs. 4w later when I went back for my 30w growth u/s she weighed 4lbs. So I think it just depends  on the baby. They also gain half a.lb in the last 10w before birth.
Yeas I am 30 and 5 days and I have the exacted same problem!!!
Yeah they have me coming in once a week to get monitored, they said right now she's better in than she would be out.
I had another one today and they said they might induce me early
I had another one today and they said they might induce me earlyOr have me stay in the hospital till she gets bigger
I had another one today and they said they might induce me earlyOr have me stay in the hospital till she gets bigger
I had a ttts scare and have been on a high protein diet to help my babies grow.  You might ask your dr if increasing your protein would help.
Okayy i will maybe ill call him

question: I'm 30 weeks and a day and my baby weighs only 2 pounds.. I have to go in for monitoring once a week anybody else having these problems?
title: the babys weight
